page.title: 09MARTINS - THE NEWSAGENTS
page.content: Martins is a newsagents situated near the bottom end of Joel Street at the roundabout.It is a good shop which has a lot of friendly staff who are always willing to lend a helping hand.Also Martins sells a really good assortment of sweets and confectionery which is really cheap and of good value.Also they have very good bargain days and some things are sold at half price. It has a morning paper delivery service that has been going for 37 years and some regulars have been receiving papers from the very start.The delivery charge is 41p a week and the paper delivered between 6 a.m. to 7.15 a.m. but the shop opens at 4.45 a.m.I do a paper round, getting to work at 5 a.m. and home again at 7.30 a.m.I play inter-shop soccer for the Martins under-21s.
